segments.text: Do you know something about Mount Tai ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . But not too much . It is considered as the head of five sacred mountains in China .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Five sacred mountains ? Why people call them so ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because in history , the Chinese emperors used to climb onto these mountains and pay tribute to their ancestors and pray for good harvest and prosperity for the whole nation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Got it . Can we see any things left by them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Definitely . There are many wall paintings and inscriptions on the huge rocks on the mountain .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to see them . How can I go there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is easy . You can go directly to Tai'an city and buy a ticket to Mount Tai .
segments.speaker: S2
